title: Riot, this is your fault not mine
body:
I was loading a game that said I was at 100% for a few seconds and then it loads me into game AND WONT LET ME MOVE OR TALK 
So now I get afk checked remade and now I lose 18 fking lp and I have 5 20 minute wait timers PLEASE FOR CRYING OUT LOUD HELP ME
Get rid of these wait timers cmon I couldn't even hit esc to log out and log back in so wtf how is this at all my fault when I can esc to restart the game OR move OR talk to let them know, seriously HELP
And btw giving me a link to a help page doesn't work it never does nothing on there explains wat happend

replies.body:
Can you clarify whether your entire computer froze up, or simply League? This will help me figure out exactly how to solve what you're seeing.

Regarding your low-priority queue, we're unable to remove any penalties as a result of the Leaverbuster system. Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a big reason why disconnections are all treated equally by the server and why we are unable to remove penalties associated with disconnections. You can find more on this system in our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
Nothing froze I could see the game progress and all but I couldn't move or hit any keys no keybind or abilities or anything I couldn't even exit the game it just froze me in fountain
Did you have to reboot your computer to temporarily resolve it, or did it eventually unfreeze and allow you to exit the game?

Before I could do anything like reboot from holding the power button I was trying like control alt delete and things like that and it just wouldn't let me but they remade and I could finally text post game

Hmm.. definitely sounds like your system temporarily froze/locked up. If you're running Windows 10, this may be caused by the Windows Game Bar, which has a feature called *Game DVR* that causes these issues for some players. I'd recommend going through [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to disable this feature.

Please let me know if this resolved your issues.

Hi SeaGodUrronuos

I've had that problem before too
Unfortunately, nothing can be done to fix this problem
This happens when your client bugs out and it doesn't load the map/champ files correctly or at all
The only thing riot can do is retrive your lp
